titleInfo.title: Congratulations to the First Graduating Class

mods.abstract: Full college status was abandoned after World War One and not restored until after World War Two. Eight students -- Martin Thomas Burke, Joseph Charles Carbuzinski, Boyd Joseph Lee, Jr., Alexander James Montesi, John Raymong Priora, Raymond Hugh Rolwing, William J. Witte, and Charles F. Zanone --were the first recipients of Bachelors degrees after the college division was reinstated.
